target.name: Chapter
target.text: Setting Up ICEcore Conference

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Installing the ICEcore Conference Client

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Use the URL in the Welcome e-mail you receive to Install the ICEcore Conference client. Use the User Name and the Password in this e-mail to sign on to ICEcore Conference. This e-mail also provides your personal PIN number and additional information. We recommend that you save this e-mail for future reference.

target.name: Step
target.text: Use the URL in the Welcome e-mail you receive to Install the ICEcore Conference client. Use the User Name and the Password in this e-mail to sign on to ICEcore Conference. This e-mail also provides your personal PIN number and additional information. We recommend that you save this e-mail for future reference.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select "Open" or "Run" to invoke the installer after the download completes.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Starting ICEcore Conference and Signing On

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In Linux and Windows, double-click the ICEcore Conference desktop icon (placed on the desktop during install).

target.name: Step
target.text: In Linux and Windows, double-click the ICEcore Conference desktop icon (placed on the desktop during install).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Screen Name field, type your screen name or select it from the menu.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Password field, type your password.

target.name: Step
target.text: Optional Settings:

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Sign On to log in.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Signing Off and Exiting

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Signing On as a Non-Registered User

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Full Name field, type your full name, first name, and then last name.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Full Name field, type your full name, first name, and then last name.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Meeting Pin field, type your Meeting PIN.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Phone field, type your phone number (optional).

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Email field, type your e-mail address (optional).

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Important Information if You are Behind a Proxy Server

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Configure Your Proxy Server Settings in Windows:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select Start > Control Panel.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Start > Control Panel.

target.name: Step
target.text: Double-click Internet Options.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Connections tab.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click on LAN settings...

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Proxy server option and configure with your proxy server settings.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: If Automatic Network Detection Fails

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Click Advanced Settings at the bottom of the Sign On screen.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Advanced Settings at the bottom of the Sign On screen.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Skip Hunt Process and Only Use HTTP option.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click OK.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Configuring Your Personal Contact Information

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Set Up Your Contact Information:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the main window, select the Contacts > Edit My Contact Info... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the main window, select the Contacts > Edit My Contact Info... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Edit your personal information (see the descriptions for the fields below).

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Read-Only Fields

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Informational Fields

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Admin Only Fields

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Configure Your Follow Me Phone Number

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Add or Modify Your Phone Numbers:

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Select Contacts > Edit My Contact Info.... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Contacts > Edit My Contact Info.... menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: Add or modify the phone numbers in the Business Phone, Home Phone, Mobile Phone, or Other Phone fields.

target.name: Step
target.text: If you have an extension in your phone number type the letter "X" before the extension. For example, (351) 123 4321 x987.

target.name: Step
target.text: Once you have modified the information, click OK.

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: To Enable Your Follow Me Phone Number:

target.name: BridgeHead
target.text: Follow Me Phone Numbers and Meetings

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Using Correct Phone Number Formatting

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Installing the Pidgin Instant Chat Client

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Download the pidgin.exe (Windows) or pidgin.rpm (Linux) executable file to your desktop.

target.name: Step
target.text: Download the pidgin.exe (Windows) or pidgin.rpm (Linux) executable file to your desktop.

target.name: Step
target.text: In Linux and Windows, double-click the pidgin (.rpm or .exe) installer (placed on the desktop during download), or select Open or Run to invoke the installer.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Installer Language dialog that appears, select your language from the drop-down list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Finish to complete the installation process.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Set Up Your Pidgin Client

target.name: Procedure
target.text: Start Pidgin.

target.name: Step
target.text: Start Pidgin.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Accounts dialog that appears, click Add.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under the Basic tab in the Add Account window:

target.name: SubSteps
target.text: Select ICEcore from the Protocol drop-down list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select ICEcore from the Protocol drop-down list.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in your ICEcore Conference screen name in the Screen Name field.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the ICEcore Conference server address in the Server field.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in your ICEcore Conference password in the Password field.

target.name: Step
target.text: Type in the alias name you would prefer to use in Pidgin instant chat client.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the Remember Password option to avoid typing in your password each type you start instant chat.

target.name: Step
target.text: Under the Advanced tab, select the ICEcore Options you want for importing your ICEcore Conference contacts:

target.name: SubSteps
target.text: Select Show All Personal Contacts to import all your personal contacts from ICEcore Conference.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Show All Personal Contacts to import all your personal contacts from ICEcore Conference.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select Show Community Contacts to import all the contacts from the ICEcore Conference Community Address Book.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click Save.

target.name: Sect2
target.text: Access the Pidgin ICEcore Conference Features
